titles.title: To suspend from January 1, 1998, until December 31, 2002, the duty on SE2SI Spray Granulated (HOE S 4291).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means
House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 3/4/1998--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2002, the duty on SE2SI Spray Granulated (HOE S 4291). Provides for retroactive application of such temporary duty reduction upon request.
